actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act of 1974 in order to suspend the provisions of sections 4, 6, and 7 thereof for 18 months.

summary.text: Suspends the provisions of the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act which require a uniform settlement statement for real estate settlement costs, advance estate settlement costs, advance disclosure of settlement costs, and disclosure of the previous selling price of existing real property for eighteen months.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act of 1974 in order to suspend the provisions of sections 4, 6, and 7 thereof for 18 months.
